title: Got a skin for a game (not aram) that I don't own
body: Hi, I recently played a game as Riven in the new draft, and I only own Dragonblade Riven, but for some reason I played the whole game as Crimson Elite Riven??????? The only "unusual" circumstance was that I traded Thresh for Riven (I asked, he didn't own Crimson Elite Riven either). Obviously it's not game breaking, but a bit troll as I thought I somehow acquired the skin, only to find out after that it was a 1-time event {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
When you trade a champ in the new champ select it doesn't update skin selection.

Since your teammates had selected the first skin onThresh it is gonnna select the first skin on Riven, whether you own it or not.

Hey Riftics - 

This was a bug with the new champion select regarding trading, as you've mentioned above. This issue should now be resolved.
